title: security features
extract: Printed features using optically variable inks (OVIs) create alluring anti-copy security features that enable fast authentication of banknotes. Printed features create effects that depending on the angle of view are either visible, change color or vanish when the banknote is tilted.
extract_html: Printed features using optically variable inks (OVIs) create alluring anti-copy security features that enable fast authentication of banknotes. Printed features create effects that depending on the angle of view are either visible, change color or vanish when the banknote is tilted.
